      static boolean CertificateUtil.isValidChain​(org.bouncycastle.cert.X509CertificateHolder[] chain)
      Verifies that the root certificate in the chain is self-signed.
      And all consecutive certificates were signed using the private key that corresponds to the public key in anterior certificate.
      Also verifies if the current date and time are within the validity period given in all the certificates.
      static boolean CertificateUtil.isValidX509​(org.bouncycastle.cert.X509CertificateHolder certificate, org.bouncycastle.cert.X509CertificateHolder issuerCertificate)
      Verifies that the certificate was signed using the private key that corresponds to the specified public key from issuer certificate.

      Verifies that the certificate was signed using the private key that corresponds to the specified public key.

      Reads a certification request in PEM format from the scanner.
      static org.bouncycastle.cert.X509CertificateHolder CertificateStreamUtil.readX509Certificate​(java.io.InputStream is)
      Generates a certificate object and initialises it with the data read from the input stream is.

      The certificate provided in is must be DER-encoded and may be supplied in binary or printable (Base64) encoding.
